Reviews.Title: “Worth staying. Great location. Friendly Staff.”

Reviews.Content: reading bad reviews stayed novotel rockford started regret booking 3 nights april 2010 main reason chose novotel location love chinatown surprisingly family major disappointing experiences staff accommodating didnt hear loud music famous pumphouse bar located beside hotel sleep perfect plasma tv level 3 huge minor blinds broke couldnt rolled spending day fixed location perfect family 3 day unlimited rail pass monorail travel city centre qvb wasting time restaurant recommend road novotel rockford japanese restaurant tempura prawns sushi japanese food definitely service awesome touch screen monitor progress try overall experience novotel rockford stay

Reviews.Title: “Definitely Not Four Star”
Reviews.Author: macadamialee
Reviews.Content: booked hotel location location darling harbour close proximity chinatown central impressive mini oldfashioned tv dark safe blanket folded properly cupboard imagine cleanliness pillows provided cotton doesnt shape pillow supposed pillow round instead rectangular easter pretty late night stayed partner meeting morning day till noon decided stay sleep till comes reception extended check time 12 instead 11am guess day housekeeper knocking door coming shutting door realizing 30 minutes 830am till noon couldnt told 9am am checking 12 knocking door 30 mins worst 1130am housekeeper unhappy told am checking 12 probably couldnt understand english didnt receive training star hotels service worst sleeping experience hotel probably sleep backpackers

Reviews.Title: “Luggage broken into, no accommodation for loss”
Reviews.Author: expat55
Reviews.Content: arrived 930 am hotel offered store luggage 300pm checkin arrived hotel 500pm bags brought noticed zipper pull luggage attached zipper pull tsa lock couldnt blame hotel directly didnt throughly inspect luggage report expected front desk accommodated afterwards 5 min using internet lobby front desk person 15 credit consider accommodation dont discussion

Reviews.Title: “Basic and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: CClarke74
Reviews.Content: hotel base exploring sydney 5 minute walk marina lots bars restaurants hotel comfortable bed basic minimalist fine 2 night stay

Reviews.Title: “Bloody noisy, slack service”
Reviews.Author: Nonoise5
Reviews.Content: request quiet hotel pretty clean comfortable except jug black mold lumps coming water guess bedroom wall niteclub doof doof night till 400am checking enjoyed stay request discount paid carpark twice didnt tickets true service attitude handy location guess pay didnt expect include live night club pay quieter
